tags.name: bq-accordion
tags.description:
The Accordion is a UI component that allows users to toggle between showing and hiding content sections. It provides a collapsible functionality, where only one section can be expanded at a time, while the others remain collapsed. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqOpen** - Handler to be called when the accordion is opened - **bqAfterOpen** - Handler to be called after the accordion is opened - **bqClose** - Handler to be called when the accordion is closed - **bqAfterClose** - Handler to be called after the accordion is closed - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the accordion gets focus - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when the accordion is clicked - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the accordion loses focus - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the accordion loses focus - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the accordion gets focus - **bqOpen** - Handler to be called when the accordion is opened - **bqAfterOpen** - Handler to be called after the accordion is opened - **bqClose** - Handler to be called when the accordion is closed - **bqAfterClose** - Handler to be called after the accordion is closed - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when the accordion is clicked ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The accordion panel content - **collapse** - The accordion collapse icon - **expand** - The accordion expand icon - **header** - The accordion header content - **prefix** - The accordion prefix content (icon or avatar) - **suffix** - The accordion suffix content (icon or avatar) ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-accordion--small-padding-y** - Accordion small vertical padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--small-padding-start** - Accordion small start padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--small-padding-end** - Accordion small end padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--small-padding-gap** - Accordion small gap distance between suffix, title and prefix _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--small-radius** - Accordion small border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--medium-padding-y** - Accordion medium vertical padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--medium-padding-start** - Accordion medium start padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--medium-padding-end** - Accordion medium end padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--medium-padding-gap** - Accordion medium gap distance between suffix, title and prefix _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--medium-radius** - Accordion medium border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--collapsed-border-color** - Accordion collapsed border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--collapsed-border-style** - Accordion collapsed border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--collapsed-border-width** - Accordion collapsed border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--expanded-border-color** - Accordion expanded border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--expanded-border-style** - Accordion expanded border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--expanded-border-width** - Accordion expanded border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--filled-collapsed-background** - Accordion filled collapsed header background _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--filled-collapsed-text-color** - Accordion filled collapsed header text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--filled-expanded-background** - Accordion filled expanded header background _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--filled-expanded-collapsed-hover** - Accordion filled expanded header color on hover _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--filled-expanded-text-color** - Accordion filled expanded header text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--ghost-collapsed-background** - Accordion ghost collapsed header background _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--ghost-collapsed-text-color** - Accordion ghost collapsed header text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--ghost-expanded-background** - Accordion ghost expanded header background _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--ghost-expanded-collapsed-hover** - Accordion ghost expanded header color on hover _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--ghost-expanded-text-color** - Accordion ghost expanded header text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-filled-border-color** - Accordion filled panel border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-filled-border-style** - Accordion filled panel border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-filled-border-width** - Accordion filled panel border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-small-filled-padding-y** - Accordion small filled panel vertical padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-small-filled-padding-start** - Accordion small filled panel start padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-small-filled-padding-end** - Accordion small filled panel end padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-medium-filled-padding-y** - Accordion medium filled panel vertical padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-medium-filled-padding-start** - Accordion medium filled panel start padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-medium-filled-padding-end** - Accordion medium filled panel end padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-ghost-border-color** - Accordion ghost panel border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-ghost-border-style** - Accordion ghost panel border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-ghost-border-width** - Accordion ghost panel border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-small-ghost-padding-y** - Accordion small ghost panel vertical padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-small-ghost-padding-start** - Accordion small ghost panel start padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-small-ghost-padding-end** - Accordion small ghost panel end padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-medium-ghost-padding-y** - Accordion medium ghost panel vertical padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-medium-ghost-padding-start** - Accordion medium ghost panel start padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-accordion--panel-medium-ghost-padding-end** - Accordion medium ghost panel end padding _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The `
` that holds the accordion content - **header** - The `` that holds the accordion header content - **panel** - The `
` that holds the accordion panel content - **prefix** - The `
` that holds the accordion prefix content - **suffix** - The `
` that holds the accordion suffix content - **text** - The `
` that holds the accordion header text content

tags.name: bq-accordion-group
tags.description: The accordion group component is a container for multiple accordion elements. It allows to manage the appearance and size of all accordions at once. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The default slot where the bq-accordion elements are placed. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-accordion-group--gap** - Accordion group distance between elements _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's base wrapper.

attributes.name: appearance
attributes.description: The appearance style of accordion to be applied to all accordions

attributes.name: expandAll
attributes.description: If true all accordions are expanded

tags.name: bq-alert
tags.description:
The Alert is a user interface component used to convey important information to the user in a clear and concise manner. It can be used to notify users of success, failure, warning, or any other type of information that needs to be brought to their attention. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqHide** - Callback handler to be called when the alert is hidden - **bqShow** - Callback handler to be called when the alert is shown - **bqAfterShow** - Callback handler to be called after the alert has been shown - **bqAfterHide** - Callback handler to be called after the alert has been hidden - **bqHide** - Callback handler to be called when the alert is hidden - **bqShow** - Callback handler to be called when the alert is shown - **bqAfterShow** - Callback handler to be called after the alert has been shown - **bqAfterHide** - Callback handler to be called after the alert has been hidden ### **Methods:** - **hide(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to hide the alert component - **show(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to show the alert component ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The alert title content (no slot name required) - **body** - The alert description content - **footer** - The alert footer content - **icon** - The predefined icon based on the alert type (info, success, warning, error, default) - **btn-close** - The close button of the alert ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-alert--background** - The alert background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-radius** - The alert border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--content-footer-gap** - The alert content and footer gap _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--title-body-gap** - The alert title and body gap _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-color** - The alert border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-style** - The alert border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-width** - The alert border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--background-info** - The alert background color for info type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--background-success** - The alert background color for success type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--background-warning** - The alert background color for warning type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--background-error** - The alert background color for error type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-info** - The alert border color for info type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-success** - The alert border color for success type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-warning** - The alert border color for warning type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--border-error** - The alert border color for error type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--icon-color-info** - The alert icon color for info type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--icon-color-success** - The alert icon color for success type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--icon-color-warning** - The alert icon color for warning type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--icon-color-error** - The alert icon color for error type _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--padding** - The alert padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-alert--min-width** - The alert min width _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The `
` container of the predefined bq-icon component - **body** - The container `
` that wraps the alert description content - **btn-close** - The `bq-button` used to close the alert - **content** - The container `
` that wraps all the alert content (title, description, footer) - **footer** - The container `
` that wraps the alert footer content - **icon** - The `` element used to render a predefined icon based on the alert type (info, success, warning, error, default) - **icon-outline** - The container `
` that wraps the icon element - **main** - The container `
` that wraps the alert main content (title, description) - **svg** - The `
` that wraps the alert title content - **wrapper** - The wrapper container `
` of the element inside the shadow DOM

attributes.name: auto-dismiss
attributes.description: If true, the alert will automatically hide after the specified amount of time

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description: If true, the alert component will remain fixed at the top of the page, occupying the full viewport

tags.name: bq-avatar
tags.description: The Avatar component is a simple and customizable element that displays an image or initials in a circular or square shape. This component is useful for displaying user profile pictures or any other image that represents a person or an entity. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - **badge** - The badge slot is used to add a badge to the avatar. The badge is a small circle or square that can be used to display a number or a status. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-avatar--background** - Avatar background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--border-color** - Avatar border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--border-style** - Avatar border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--border-width** - Avatar border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--border-radius-circle** - Avatar border radius for circle & any size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--border-radius-squareXs** - Avatar border radius for square & size xsmall _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--border-radius-squareS** - Avatar border radius for square & size small _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--border-radius-squareM** - Avatar border radius for square & size medium/large _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--size-xsmall** - Avatar xsmall size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--size-small** - Avatar small size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--size-medium** - Avatar medium size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--size-large** - Avatar large size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--badge-top-square** - Badge top position shape square _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--badge-left-square** - Badge left position shape square _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--badge-top-circle** - Badge top position shape circle _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-avatar--badge-left-circle** - Badge left position shape circle _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's internal wrapper. - **img** - The `` tag element that load the image source. - **text** - The `` tag element that rendered the `Initials` text string. - **badge** - The container that wraps the badge slot element.

attributes.description: Alternate text for the avatar image if the image cannot be displayed.

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: The image source to load on the avatar (this can be also a base64 encoded image).

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: A text to use for describing the avatar on assistive devices.

attributes.name: initials
attributes.description: The text to display on avatar.

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: The shape of the avatar.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size of the avatar.

tags.name: bq-badge
tags.description: The Badge component is a visual indicator that can be added to various elements within a user interface. It is typically used to highlight important or relevant information, such as alerts, notifications, or statuses. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The default slot is used to add content to the badge. The content can be a number or a text. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-badge--background-color** - The badge background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--box-shadow** - The badge box shadow _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--border-color** - The badge border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--border-radius** - The badge border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--border-style** - The badge border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--border-width** - The badge border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--size-small** - The badge small size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--size-medium** - The badge medium size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--size-large** - The badge large size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-badge--text-color** - The badge text color _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's internal wrapper that holds the count. - **number** - The component's internal wrapper that holds the slot.

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description: Badge background color. The value should be a valid value of the palette color.

attributes.name: text-color
attributes.description: Badge number color. The value should be a valid value of the palette color.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size of the badge. Relevant if badge has no content.

tags.name: bq-breadcrumb
tags.description: The Breadcrumb is used to wraps a series of breadcrumb items to indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The default slot is used to add `bq-breadcrumb-item` items to the breadcrumb. - **separator** - The slot to add a separator between breadcrumb items. Default separator is `/`. ### **CSS Parts:** - **navigation** - The `nav` tag that loads the breadcrumb items - **separator** - The container that wraps the separator element

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The `aria-label` attribute to describe the type of navigation

tags.name: bq-breadcrumb-item
tags.description: The Breadcrumb Item helps users understand their current location within a website or application's hierarchical structure. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when item is focused - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when item is clicked - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when item loses focus - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when item loses focus - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when item is focused - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when item is clicked ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The default slot is used to add content to the breadcrumb item. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--background** - Background color of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--box-shadow** - Box shadow of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--border-color** - Border color of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--border-style** - Border style of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--border-width** - Border width of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--border-radius** - Border radius of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--line-height** - Line height of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--text-color** - Text color of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--text-color-current** - Text color of the current breadcrumb item (active) _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--text-size** - Text size of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--text-size-separator** - Text size of the breadcrumb item separator _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--padding-start** - Padding start of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--padding-end** - Padding end of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--paddingY** - Padding top and bottom of the breadcrumb item _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--padding-start-separator** - Padding start of the breadcrumb item separator _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-breadcrumb-item--padding-end-separator** - Padding end of the breadcrumb item separator _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component wrapper container - **content** - The `span` tag that wraps the content item - **item** - The breadcrumb item wrapper (`button` or `a`) - **separator** - The `span` tag that wraps the separator element

tags.name: bq-card
tags.description:
The Card component serves as a versatile container designed for flexible content presentation within user interfaces. Its structure accommodates various styles, allowing users to customize and adapt it according to their design preferences. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The content of the card component ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-card--borderColor** - Card border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-card--borderRadius** - Card border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-card--borderStyle** - Card border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-card--borderWidth** - Card border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-card--padding** - Card padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-card--paddingMinimal** - Minimal card padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-card--background** - Card background color _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **wrapper** - The wrapper container `
` of the element inside the shadow DOM

attributes.description: Type of card component

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: The corner radius of the card component

tags.name: bq-checkbox
tags.description:
The checkbox is a UI component that allows users to select one or more options from a list of choices. It is commonly used in forms, surveys, and settings pages. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqChange** - Handler to be called when the checkbox state changes - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the checkbox gets focus - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the checkbox loses focus - **bqChange** - Handler to be called when the checkbox state changes - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the checkbox gets focus - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the checkbox loses focus ### **Methods:** - **vClick()** - Simulate a click event on the native `` HTML element used under the hood. Use this method instead of the global `element.click()`. - **vFocus()** - Sets focus on the native `` HTML element used under the hood. Use this method instead of the global `element.focus()`. - **vBlur()** - Remove focus from the native `` HTML element used under the hood. Use this method instead of the global `element.blur()`. ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The content of the checkbox component ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-checkbox--size** - Checkbox size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-checkbox--border-radius** - Checkbox border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-checkbox--border-width** - Checkbox border width _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's internal wrapper of the checkbox component. - **control** - The container `
` element that holds the custom checkbox. - **input** - The native HTML `` used under the hood. - **checkbox** - The `` element that renders the custom checked/indeterminate state. - **label** - The `` element that holds the text content.

attributes.description: If true checkbox displays background on hover

attributes.name: form-id
attributes.description: The form ID that the checkbox is associated with

attributes.name: form-validation-message
attributes.description: The native form validation message

attributes.description: If `true`, it will indicate that the user must specify a value for the checkbox before the owning form can be submitted

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: A string representing the value of the checkbox. Primarily used to differentiate a list of related checkboxes that have the same name

tags.name: bq-col

attributes.description: The attribute description, use always kebab-case.

tags.name: bq-date-picker
tags.description: The Date Picker is a intuitive UI element component allows users to select dates from a visual calendar interface, providing an intuitive way to input date information. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - Callback handler emitted when the input loses focus. - **bqChange** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has changed and the input loses focus. - **bqClear** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has been cleared. - **bqFocus** - Callback handler emitted when the input has received focus. - **bqBlur** - Callback handler emitted when the input loses focus - **bqChange** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has changed and the input loses focus. This handler is called whenever the user finishes typing or pasting text into the input field and then clicks outside of the input field. - **bqClear** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has been cleared - **bqFocus** - Callback handler emitted when the input has received focus ### **Methods:** - **clear(): _Promise_** - Clears the selected value. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-date-picker--background-color** - Date picker background color. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--border-color** - Date picker border color. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--border-color-disabled** - Date picker border color when disabled. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--border-color-focus** - Date picker border color on focus. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--border-radius** - Date picker border radius. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--border-style** - Date picker border style. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--border-width** - Date picker border width. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--currentDate-border-color** - Date picker border color for current date. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--currentDate-border-width** - Date picker border width for current date. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--day-size** - Date picker button day size. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--gap** - Gap between Date picker content and prefix/suffix. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--icon-size** - Icon size to use in prefix/suffix and clear button. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--label-margin-bottom** - Date picker label margin bottom. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--label-text-color** - Date picker label text color. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--label-text-size** - Date picker label text size. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--padding-end** - Date picker padding end. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--padding-start** - Date picker padding start. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--paddingY** - Date picker padding top and bottom. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--range-background-color** - Background color for the selected date range in the date picker. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--range-inner-background-color** - Background color for the selected dates inside the date range in the date picker. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--text-color** - Date picker text color. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--text-placeholder-color** - Date picker placeholder text color. _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-date-picker--text-size** - Date picker text size. _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's base wrapper. - **button** - The native HTML button used under the hood in the clear button. - **calendar__button** - Any button used in the calendar-month component. - **calendar__button** - Any button within the calendar-range component. - **calendar__container** - The calendar-range container for the entire component. - **calendar__day** - The buttons corresponding to each day in the calendar-month grid. - **calendar__disabled** - A button that is disabled due to min/max on the calendar-range component. - **calendar__disallowed** - Any day that has been disallowed via isDateDisallowed. - **calendar__head** - The calendar-month table's header row. - **calendar__header** - The calendar-range container for the heading and buttons. - **calendar__heading** - The calendar-month heading container that labels the month. - **calendar__heading** - The calendar-range heading containing the month and year. - **calendar__next** - The next page button on the calendar-range component. - **calendar__outside** - Any days which are outside the current month. - **calendar__previous** - The previous page button on the calendar-range component. - **calendar__range-end** - The day at the end of a date range. - **calendar__range-inner** - Any days between the start and end of a date range. - **calendar__range-start** - The day at the start of a date range. - **calendar__selected** - Any days which are selected. - **calendar__table** - The calendar-month element. - **calendar__td** - The calendar-month table's body cells. - **calendar__th** - The calendar-month table's header cells. - **calendar__today** - The Today's day. - **calendar__tr** - Any row within the table on the calendar-month component. - **calendar__week** - The calendar-month table's body rows. - **clear-btn** - The clear button. - **control** - The input control wrapper. - **input** - The native HTML input element used under the hood. - **label** - The label slot container. - **panel** - The date picker panel container - **prefix** - The prefix slot container. - **suffix** - The suffix slot container.

tags.name: bq-dialog
tags.description:
The Dialog component is used to display additional content or prompt a user for action. It provides a way to display additional information, options, or controls in a separate, non-obstructive interface element. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqCancel** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog has been canceled or dismissed. - **bqClose** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog will close. - **bqOpen** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog will open. - **bqAfterOpen** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog finish opening. - **bqAfterClose** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog finish closing. - **bqCancel** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog has been canceled or dismissed - **bqClose** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog will close - **bqOpen** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog will open - **bqAfterOpen** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog finish opening - **bqAfterClose** - Callback handler emitted when the dialog finish closing ### **Methods:** - **show()** - Open the dialog - **hide()** - Closes the dialog - **cancel()** - Dismiss or cancel the dialog ### **Slots:** - **title** - The title content of the dialog. - _default_ - The body content of the dialog. - **footer** - The footer content of the dialog. - **button-close** - The close button content of the dialog. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-dialog--background** - Dialog background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--background-backdrop** - Dialog backdrop background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--box-shadow** - Dialog box shadow _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--border-color** - Dialog border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--border-style** - Dialog border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--border-width** - Dialog border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--border-radius** - Dialog border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--padding** - Dialog padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--content-footer-gap** - Dialog gap distance between content and footer elements _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--title-body-gap** - Dialog gap distance between title and body elements _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--width-small** - Dialog small width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--width-medium** - Dialog medium width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog--width-large** - Dialog large width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-dialog-z-index** - Dialog z-index applied when opened _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **body** - The `
` that holds the dialog body content. - **button-close** - The button that closes the dialog on click. - **content** - The `
` container that holds the dialog title and body content. - **dialog** - The `` wrapper container inside the shadow DOM. - **footer** - The `
` that holds footer content. - **header** - The `
` that holds the icon, title, description and close button. - **title** - The `
` that holds the title content.

tags.name: bq-drawer
tags.description:
The Drawer component provides a sliding panel interface commonly used for navigation or presenting additional content without taking up significant screen space. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqClose** - Callback handler to be called when the drawer is closed. - **bqOpen** - Callback handler to be called when the drawer is opened. - **bqAfterOpen** - Callback handler to be called after the drawer has been opened. - **bqAfterClose** - Callback handler to be called after the drawer has been closed. - **bqClose** - Callback handler to be called when the drawer is closed - **bqOpen** - Callback handler to be called when the drawer is opened - **bqAfterOpen** - Callback handler to be called after the drawer has been opened - **bqAfterClose** - Callback handler to be called after the drawer has been closed ### **Methods:** - **handlePlacementChange()** - !TO BE REMOVED: Delete this `@Watch()` once the deprecated `placement` property is removed We need to maintain retro-compatibility with the deprecated `placement` property - **hide(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to hide the drawer component - **show(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to show the drawer component ### **Slots:** - **title** - The title content of the drawer. - _default_ - The body content of the drawer. - **footer** - The footer content of the drawer. - **button-close** - The close button content of the drawer. - **footer-divider** - The footer divider content of the drawer. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-drawer--backgroundBackdrop** - Background color of the backdrop _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-drawer--gap** - Gap between the drawer and the viewport _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-drawer--width** - Width of the drawer _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-drawer--paddingX** - Padding left and right of the drawer _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-drawer--paddingY** - Padding top and bottom of the drawer _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-drawer--zIndex** - Z-index of the drawer component _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **backdrop** - The `
` that holds the backdrop overlay. - **button-close** - The BqButton that closes the drawer. - **button-close__btn** - The native button used under the hood that closes the drawer. - **button-close__label** - The text inside the native button that closes the drawer. - **panel** - The `
` that holds the drawer entire content. - **header** - The `
` that holds the icon, title, and close button. - **title** - The `
` that holds the title content. - **body** - The `
` that holds the drawer body content. - **footer** - The `
` that holds footer content.

tags.name: bq-dropdown
tags.description:
The Dropdown Component is commonly used when presenting a list of selectable options that are too numerous to fit comfortably on the screen. They provide an efficient way to save space and present a long list of options in a compact and organized manner. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqOpen** - Callback handler to be called when the dropdown panel is opened or closed. - **bqOpen** - Callback handler to be called when the dropdown panel is opened or closed. ### **Methods:** - **onClickOutside(event: _MouseEvent_)** - Listens for the 'click' event on the document object and closes the dropdown panel if the click is outside the component. - **onEscape(event: _KeyboardEvent_)** - Listens for the 'keyup' event on the window object and closes the dropdown panel if the 'Escape' key or 'Tab' key outside the component is pressed. ### **Slots:** - **trigger** - The trigger element that opens the dropdown panel. - _default_ - The content of the dropdown panel. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-panel--background** - Panel background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--border-color** - Panel border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--border-radius** - Panel border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--border-style** - Panel border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--border-width** - Panel border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--box-shadow** - Panel box shadow _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--padding** - Panel padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--height** - Panel height _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel--width** - Panel width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-panel-z-index** - Panel z-index applied when opened _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's internal wrapper. - **dropdown** - The `` element used under the hood to display the dropdown panel. - **panel** - The `
` element used to display and style the panel inside the `` element. - **trigger** - The `
` element that hosts the trigger element.

tags.name: bq-input
tags.description: The Input component is a fundamental user interface element that allows users to input data by typing it into a text field. It is commonly used in web and mobile applications for various purposes, such as collecting user information, search inputs, and login forms. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - Callback handler emitted when the input loses focus. - **bqChange** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has changed and the input loses focus. - **bqClear** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has been cleared. - **bqFocus** - Callback handler emitted when the input has received focus. - **bqInput** - Callback handler emitted when the input value changes. - **bqBlur** - Callback handler emitted when the input loses focus - **bqChange** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has changed and the input loses focus. This handler is called whenever the user finishes typing or pasting text into the input field and then clicks outside of the input field. - **bqClear** - Callback handler emitted when the input value has been cleared - **bqFocus** - Callback handler emitted when the input has received focus - **bqInput** - Callback handler emitted when the input value changes. This handler is called whenever the user types or pastes text into the input field. ### **Slots:** - **label** - The label slot container. - **prefix** - The prefix slot container. - **suffix** - The suffix slot container. - **helper-text** - The helper text slot container. - **clear-icon** - The clear icon slot container. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-input--background-color** - Input background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--border-color** - Input border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--border-color-focus** - Input border color on focus _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--border-radius** - Input border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--border-width** - Input border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--border-style** - Input border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--gap** - Gap between input content and prefix/suffix _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--helper-margin-top** - Helper text margin top _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--helper-text-color** - Helper text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--helper-text-size** - Helper text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--icon-size** - Icon size to use in prefix/suffix and clear button _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--label-margin-bottom** - Input label margin bottom _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--label-text-color** - Input label text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--label-text-size** - Input label text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--padding-start** - Input padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--padding-end** - Input padding end _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--paddingY** - Input padding top and bottom _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-input--text-color** - Input text color _(default: undefined)_ - tags.name: bq-notification
tags.description:
The Notification component is a user interface element used to provide information or alerts to users in a non-intrusive manner. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqAfterClose** - Callback handler to be called after the notification has been closed - **bqAfterOpen** - Callback handler to be called after the notification has been opened - **bqHide** - Callback handler to be called when the notification is hidden - **bqShow** - Callback handler to be called when the notification is shown - **bqHide** - Callback handler to be called when the notification is hidden - **bqShow** - Callback handler to be called when the notification is shown - **bqAfterOpen** - Callback handler to be called after the notification has been opened - **bqAfterClose** - Callback handler to be called after the notification has been closed ### **Methods:** - **hide(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to hide the notification component - **show(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to show the notification component - **toast()** - This method can be used to display notifications in a fixed-position element that allows for stacking multiple notifications vertically ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The notification title content - **body** - The notification description content - **footer** - The notification footer content - **icon** - The icon to be displayed in the notification - **btn-close** - The close button of the notification ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-notification--background** - The notification background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-notification--box-shadow** - tags.name: bq-option
tags.description: An option refers to a specific choice that appears in a list of selectable items that can be opened or closed by the user. It can be an element of the navigation system that allows users to select different sections or pages within an application or it can be used within a dropdown list. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when item loses focus. - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when item is focused. - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when item is clicked. - **bqEnter** - Handler to be called on enter key press. - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when item loses focus - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when item is focused - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when item is clicked - **bqEnter** - Handler to be called on enter key press ### **Slots:** - **prefix** - The prefix content to be displayed before the label. - _default_ - The label content to be displayed. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-option--background** - background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--font-size** - font size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--border-color** - border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--border-style** - border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--border-width** - border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--border-radius** - border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--box-shadow** - box shadow _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--gap-start** - gap space between prefix and label _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--gap-end** - gap space between label and suffix _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--paddingY** - padding Y axis _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--padding-start** - option label padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option--padding-end** - option label padding end _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's internal wrapper. - **label** - The `span` element in which the label text is displayed. - **prefix** - The `span` element in which the prefix is displayed (generally `bq-icon`). - **suffix** - The `span` element in which the suffix is displayed (generally `bq-icon`).

tags.name: bq-option-group
tags.description: The option group component is a container for multiple option elements. It allows to manage the appearance and size of all options at once. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - **header-label** - The label of the option group - **header-prefix** - The prefix of the label - **header-suffix** - The suffix of the label - _default_ - The option items ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-option-group--background** - option group background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--font-size** - option group font size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--line-height** - option group line height _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--label-padding-start** - option group header padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--label-padding-end** - option group header padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--label-paddingY** - option group header padding Y axis _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--label-text-padding-start** - option group text within label padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--label-text-padding-end** - option group text within label padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-option-group--container-padding-start** - option group container padding start _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **label** - The `legend` tag element which acts as a container for the label - **prefix** - The prefix of the label - **label** - The text of the label - **suffix** - The suffix of the label - **group** - The `div` element which holds the option items

tags.name: bq-option-list

It allows to manage the appearance and size of all options at once. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqSelect** - Handler to be called when `bq-option` is selected (on click/enter press). ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The option items ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-option-group--gapY-list** - Option group gap between items Y axis _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's internal wrapper.

tags.name: bq-page-title
tags.description:
The Page Title component is a versatile and essential element used to display the main title of a page or section within an application. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - **back** - The back navigation button. - _default_ - The main title content. - **sub-title** - The sub-title content. - **suffix** - The suffix content. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--paddingY** - Padding top and bottom of the page title wrapper _(default: undefined)_ - **--subtitle-borderBlockEnd** - Page title border end color _(default: undefined)_ - **--subtitle-fontWeight** - Page title font weight for subtitle _(default: undefined)_ - **--subtitle-textColor** - Page title color for sub-title _(default: undefined)_ - **--subtitle-textSize** - Page title text size for subtitle _(default: undefined)_ - **--title-fontWeight** - Page title font weight for title _(default: undefined)_ - **--title-lineHeight** - Page title text line height _(default: undefined)_ - **--title-textColor** - Page title color for title _(default: undefined)_ - **--title-textSize** - Page title text size for title _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The inner container `
`of element that contains the base page title component. - **content** - Defines the main container of the page title component, which includes the title and subtitle elements. - **title-suffix** - Defines the container that holds the title and any suffix content. - **back** - The container `
` page title element that acts as back slot container. - **title** - The `

` element serves as a container for the page title content, to improve accessibility. - **suffix** - The `
` page title element that acts as suffix slot container. - **sub-title** - The `
` page title element that acts as sub-title slot container.

The Panel component is a versatile and essential element used to wrap and display content in a floating panel. ## Examples --- ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The content of the panel. ### **CSS Parts:** - **panel** - The `

tags.name: bq-progress
tags.description:
The progress bar is a user interface component that visually represents the completion status of a task or process. ## Examples --- ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-progress-bar--height** - The progress bars height _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-progress-bar--indeterminateWidth** - The progress bar width when its indeterminate _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-progress-bar--indicatorColor** - The progress bar color (inside the track area) _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-progress-bar--trackColor** - The progress bar track area (the grey one) _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **wrapper** - The component wrapper container inside the shadow DOM - **progress** - The `

tags.name: bq-radio
tags.description: The radio button is a user interface element that allows users to select a single option. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the radio loses focus - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when the radio state changes - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the radio gets focused - **bqKeyDown** - The handler is to be called when the radio key is pressed - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when the radio state changes - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the radio gets focus - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the radio loses focus - **bqKeyDown** - Handler to be called when the radio key is pressed ### **Methods:** - **vClick()** - Simulate a click event on the native `` HTML element used under the hood. Use this method instead of the global `element.click()`. - **vFocus()** - Sets focus on the native `` HTML element used under the hood. Use this method instead of the global `element.focus()`. - **vBlur()** - Remove focus from the native `` HTML element used under the hood. Use this method instead of the global `element.blur()`. - **getNativeInput()** - Returns the native `` HTML element used under the hood. ### **Slots:** - _default_ - The bq-radio item ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-radio--size** - Radio size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-radio--border-width** - Radio border width _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's internal wrapper of the radio component. - **input** - The native HTML `` used under the hood. - **radio** - The component's internal wrapper of the radio component. - **label** - The `` element that holds the text content.

tags.name: bq-select
tags.description: The select input component lets users choose from a predefined list, commonly used in forms for easy data selection. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - The callback handler is emitted when the Select input loses focus. - **bqClear** - The callback handler is emitted when the selected value has been cleared. - **bqFocus** - A callback handler is emitted when the Select input has received focus. - **bqSelect** - The callback handler is emitted when the selected value has changed. - **bqBlur** - Callback handler emitted when the Select input loses focus - **bqClear** - Callback handler emitted when the selected value has been cleared - **bqFocus** - Callback handler emitted when the Select input has received focus - **bqSelect** - Callback handler emitted when the selected value has changed ### **Methods:** - **clear(): _Promise_** - Clears the selected value. ### **Slots:** - **label** - The label slot container. - **prefix** - The prefix slot container. - **tags** - The tags slot container. - **clear-icon** - The clear icon slot container. - **suffix** - The suffix slot container. - **helper-text** - The helper text slot container. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-select--background-color** - Select background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--border-color** - Select border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--border-color-focus** - Select border color on focus _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--border-color-disabled** - Select border color when disabled _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--border-radius** - Select border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--border-width** - Select border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--border-style** - Select border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--gap** - Gap between Select content and prefix/suffix _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--helper-margin-top** - Helper text margin top _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--helper-text-color** - Helper text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--helper-text-size** - Helper text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--icon-size** - Icon size to use in prefix/suffix and clear button _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--label-margin-bottom** - Select label margin bottom _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--label-text-color** - Select label text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--label-text-size** - Select label text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--padding-start** - Select padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--padding-end** - Select padding end _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--paddingY** - Select padding top and bottom _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--text-color** - Select text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--text-size** - Select text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-select--text-placeholder-color** - Select placeholder text color _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's base wrapper. - **button** - The native HTML button used under the hood in the clear button. - **clear-btn** - The clear button. - **control** - The input control wrapper. - **input-outline** - The input outline wrapper that holds the tags container and the native HTML input used under the hood. - **helper-text** - The helper text slot container. - **input** - The native HTML input element used under the hood. - **label** - The label slot container. - **panel** - The select panel container - **prefix** - The prefix slot container. - **suffix** - The suffix slot container. - **tags** - The tags container of the BqTags for multiple selection. - **tag** - The tag container of the BqTag for multiple selection. - **tag__base** - The base wrapper of the BqTag for multiple selection. - **tag__prefix** - The prefix slot container of the BqTag for multiple selection. - **tag__text** - The text slot container of the BqTag for multiple selection. - **tag__btn-close** - The close button of the BqTag for multiple selection. - **option-list** - The option list container.

tags.name: bq-side-menu
tags.description:
The default side menu serves as a versatile container for organizing and displaying navigation elements, with default side menu items providing a clean and straightforward way to represent individual menu options. Together, they form the foundation for building structured and intuitive side menu layouts. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqCollapse** - Callback handler to be called when the Side menu changes its width from expanded to collapse and vice versa. - **bqSelect** - Callback handler to be called when the active/selected menu item changes. - **bqCollapse** - Callback handler to be called when the Side menu changes its width from expanded to collapse and vice versa - **bqSelect** - Callback handler to be called when the active/selected menu item changes ### **Methods:** - **toggleCollapse()** - Toggle the collapse state of the side menu ### **Slots:** - **logo** - The section for displaying the logo or brand in the side menu. - **The** - main section that holds all menu items. - **footer** - The section for adding footer content to the side menu. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-side-menu--bg-color** - Side menu background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu--brand-color** - Side menu logo color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu--border-color** - Side menu border color _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - HTML `
` root container - **footer** - HTML `
` element that holds the footer - **logo** - HTML `
` element that holds the logo - **nav** - HTML `
` element that holds the navigation items

tags.name: bq-side-menu-item
tags.description:
Represents the default side menu item for standard navigation elements, providing a clean and straightforward way to display menu options. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the button loses focus. - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when the button gets focused. - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the button is clicked. - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the button loses focus - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the button is clicked - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when button gets focus ### **Slots:** - **prefix** - The prefix part of menu item. - _default_ - The content of the menu item. - **suffix** - The suffix part of menu item. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-side-menu-item--bg-default** - Side menu item default background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--bg-hover** - Side menu item hover background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--bg-active** - Side menu item active background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--text-default** - Side menu item default text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--text-hover** - Side menu item hover text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--text-active** - Side menu item active text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--text-disabled** - Side menu item disable text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--paddingX** - Side menu item vertical padding _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-side-menu-item--paddingY** - Side menu item horizontal padding _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component wrapper container inside the shadow DOM - **label** - The label slot - **prefix** - The prefix slot - **suffix** - The suffix slot - **panel** - The `
` container that holds the tooltip content (when the side menu is collapsed) - **trigger** - The `
` container that holds the element which displays tooltip on hover (when the side menu is collapsed)

attributes.name: active

tags.name: bq-slider
tags.description: Sliders provide a visual representation of adjustable content, enabling users to change values by dragging a handle along a horizontal track. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the slider loses focus. - **bqChange** - Handler to be called when changing the value on range inputs. - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the slider gets focused. - **bqChange** - Handler to be called when change the value on range inputs - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the slider loses focus - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the slider gets focused ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-slider--size** - The height of the slider track/progress area _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-slider--border-radius** - Slider border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-slider--thumb-size** - Slider hover thumb size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-slider--progress-color** - Slider progress background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-slider--trackarea-color** - Slider track background color _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's base wrapper. - **container** - The container of the slider. - **track-area** - The track area of the slider. - **progress-area** - The progress area of the slider. - **input-min** - The input element for the value when the slider type is `single` or the minimum value when the slider type is `range`. - **input-max** - The input element for the maximum value. - **label-start** - The label for the value when the slider type is `single` or the minimum value when the slider type is `range`. - **label-end** - The label for maximum value when the slider type is `range`.

attributes.name: debounce-time
attributes.description: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger thebqChangeevent after each value change.

attributes.name: disabled

attributes.name: enable-tooltip
attributes.description: If `true`, a tooltip will be shown displaying the progress value.

attributes.name: enable-value-indicator
attributes.description: If`true`it will show the value label on the side of the slider track area.

attributes.name: gap
attributes.description: A number representing the amount to remain between the minimum and maximum values (only for range type).

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: A number representing the max value of the slider.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: A number representing the min value of the slider.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: A number represents the step of the slider.  Please notice that the value (or list of values if the slider type isrange) will be rounded to the nearest multiple ofstep.

attributes.name: tooltip-always-visible
attributes.description: If`true`, a tooltip will always display the progress value. It relies on enableTooltip and if enableTooltip is false, tooltipAlwaysVisible cannot be true.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: It defines the type of slider to display.

attributes.name: value

tags.name: bq-tag
tags.description:
The Tag Component is a UI element used to label and categorize content within an application. Tags are commonly used to label items with keywords or categories, making it easier to find and organize content. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqClose** - Callback handler to be called when the tag is close/hidden - **bqOpen** - Callback handler to be called when the tag is not open/shown - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when tag loses focus - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when tag is clicked - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when tag is focused - **bqClose** - Callback handler to be called when the tag is close/hidden - **bqOpen** - Callback handler to be called when the tag is not open/shown - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when tag loses focus - **bqClick** - Handler to be called when tag is clicked - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when tag is focused ### **Methods:** - **hide(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to remove the tag component - **show(): _Promise_** - Method to be called to show the tag component ### **Slots:** - **prefix** - The prefix slot to add an icon or any other content before the text - _default_ - The text content of the tag ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-tag--background-color** - Tag background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--border-color** - Tag border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--border-radius** - Tag border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--border-style** - Tag border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--border-width** - Tag border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--small-border-radius** - Tag small border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--small-gap** - Tag small gap between content _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--small-padding-x** - Tag small padding horizontal _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--small-padding-y** - Tag small padding vertical _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--medium-gap** - Tag medium gap between content _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--medium-padding-x** - Tag medium padding horizontal _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-tag--medium-padding-y** - Tag medium padding vertical _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **wrapper** - The wrapper container `
` of the element inside the shadow DOM. - **prefix** - The `` tag element that acts as prefix container (when icon exists in front of tag). - **text** - The `
` element containing the text of the tag component. - **btn-close** - The close button element to remove the tag component.

tags.name: bq-textarea
tags.description: The Textarea component is a multi-line text input control that is often used in a form to collect user inputs like comments or reviews. ## Examples --- ### **Events:** - **bqBlur** - Handler to be called when the textarea loses focus. - **bqChange** - Handler to be called when the textarea value has changed and the textarea loses focus. - **bqClear** - Handler to be called when the textarea value has been cleared. - **bqFocus** - Handler to be called when the textarea has received focus. - **bqInput** - Handler to be called when the textarea value changes. - **bqBlur** - Callback handler emitted when the textarea loses focus - **bqChange** - Callback handler emitted when the textarea value has changed and the textarea loses focus. This handler is called whenever the user finishes typing or pasting text into the textarea field and then clicks outside of the textarea field. - **bqClear** - Callback handler emitted when the textarea value has been cleared - **bqFocus** - Callback handler emitted when the textarea has received focus - **bqInput** - Callback handler emitted when the textarea value changes. This handler is called whenever the user types or pastes text into the textarea field. ### **Slots:** - **label** - The textarea label. - **helper-text** - The helper text. ### **CSS Properties:** - **--bq-textarea--background-color** - Textarea background color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--border-color** - Textarea border color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--border-color-focus** - Textarea border color on focus _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--border-radius** - Textarea border radius _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--border-width** - Textarea border width _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--border-style** - Textarea border style _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--helper-margin-top** - Textarea helper text margin top _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--helper-text-color** - Textarea helper text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--helper-text-size** - Textarea helper text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--label-margin-bottom** - Textarea label margin bottom _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--label-text-color** - Textarea label text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--label-text-size** - Textarea label text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--paddingY** - Textarea padding top and bottom _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--padding-start** - Textarea padding start _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--padding-end** - Textarea padding end _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--text-color** - Textarea text color _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--text-size** - Textarea text size _(default: undefined)_ - **--bq-textarea--text-placeholder-color** - Textarea placeholder text color _(default: undefined)_ ### **CSS Parts:** - **base** - The component's base wrapper. - **input** - The textarea element. - **label** - The textarea label. - **helper-info** - The helper info container. - **helper-text** - The helper text. - **helper-counter** - The helper counter.
